definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

pinyin: wen1 shi4 fei4 qi4 chu3 cun2

sentences.english: And you know what, the waste you exhale when you smoke is more toxic to cause cancer.
sentences.chinese: 你知道嗎，你吸菸時呼出的廢氣更加具有致癌性質。

sentences.english: Exhaust fumes made him drowsy and brought on a headache.
sentences.chinese: 廢氣把他薰得昏昏沉沉，還引起了頭疼。

sentences.english: Dirt and coke thing to waste gas by the combustion chamber and a combustion emissions vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 污垢及積碳物將經燃燒室燃燒後與廢氣一道排出車外。

sentences.english: Rubbish collectors are following behind the procession picking up discarded bottles, bound to be making a big fortune today.
sentences.chinese: 撿廢氣瓶子的拾荒者跟在隊伍後面，他們也收穫頗豐。

sentences.english: An experimental investigation on purification of ethylbenzene waste gas is conducted in a biofilter packed with ceramic pellets.
sentences.chinese: 以陶粒作爲生物過濾牀的填料淨化含乙苯廢氣。

sentences.english: The exhaust fume belched by the car contaminates air seriously.
sentences.chinese: 汽車所排放的廢氣嚴重污染空氣。

sentences.english: Waste gas emitted by cars has exerted a baneful influence on natural environment.
sentences.chinese: 汽車排出的廢氣對自然環境有極壞的影響。

sentences.english: Gases from cars are poisoning the air of our cities.
sentences.chinese: 車子排出來的廢氣污染了城市的空氣。

sentences.english: The exhaust fumes from factories polluted the air above the city.
sentences.chinese: 從工廠排出的廢氣污染了城市上空的空氣。

sentences.english: The solution is to replace the turbo wastegate solenoid valve.
sentences.chinese: 解決方法是更換渦輪廢氣旁通閥電磁閥。

sentences.english: The exhaust emitted by factories and auto contaminates air heavily.
sentences.chinese: 工廠和汽車放出的廢氣嚴重污染大氣。

sentences.english: The developed technique is applied to ambient air and automobile exhaust analysis.
sentences.chinese: 將研究所得的技術應用於環境空氣煳汽車廢氣的分析。

sentences.english: The rising position of gas temperature was stabled by adjusting pallet speed, and the short-term control was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 短期控制通過調整機速，穩定廢氣溫度上升點實現。

sentences.english: Filtering protection waste gas exhaustion system.
sentences.chinese: 過載保護功能，廢氣抽風系統。

sentences.english: Every day, every person the release of emissions, about 500 milliliters around.
sentences.chinese: 每天，每個人釋放的廢氣，大約500毫升左右。

sentences.english: Bigger says the exhaust has a light waxy smell, like paraffin.
sentences.chinese: 比格爾說，排放的廢氣有一種輕微的石蠟氣味。

definition: to eliminate dust (i.e. filter out suspended particles)
